bill_title: revise Senate Bill 38, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2020, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise Senate Bill 38, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2020, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That section 1 of SB 38 as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature be amended to read: BUREAU OF FINANCE AND MANAGEMENT (BFM): (2) Computer Services and Development Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$0" and insert "$55,760,060" Section 2. That section 6 of Senate Bill 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (3) Medical Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$226,699,293" and insert "$214,421,877" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$425,719,070" and insert "$410,659,049" "$424,773,394" (4) Children's Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$37,042,841" and insert "$34,892,841" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$44,243,920" and insert "$49,114,752" "$49,598,663" (5) Behavioral Health Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$59,889,875" and insert "$57,714,191" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$33,721,971" and insert "$34,894,940" Section 3. That section 7 of Senate Bill 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (2) Health Systems Development and Regulation Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$7,284,070" and insert "$8,806,737" "$8,821,797" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$1,156,540" and insert "$4,826,881" (3) Family and Community Health Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$10,600,921" and insert "$10,800,921" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$2,036,929" and insert "$2,111,929" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$16,717,088" and insert "$18,039,755" "$19,039,755" Section 4. That section 8 of SB 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND REGULATION (2) Unemployment Insurance Service Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$4,149,185" and insert "$5,758,187" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$2,637,079" and insert "$4,832,839" FTE, delete "72.0" and insert "82.0" Section 5. That section 10 of SB 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (11) Education Resources Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$8,716,179" and insert "$7,898,678" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$175,481,630" and insert "$175,491,423" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$604,572" and insert "$1,354,572" Section 6. That section 14 of SB 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS (2) State Veterans' Home Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$0" and insert "$191,884" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$3,329,930" and insert "$3,203,367" Section 7. That section 15 of SB 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (8) Juvenile Community Corrections Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$3,356,457" and insert "$3,537,221" Section 8. That section 16 of Senate Bill 38, as previously enacted by the Ninety-fifth Session of the South Dakota Legislature, be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (2) Developmental Disabilities Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$63,311,136" and insert "$64,311,136" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$92,214,209" and insert "$93,561,076" "$98,151,680" (3) South Dakota Developmental Center - Redfield Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$8,434,038" and insert "$7,802,981" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$11,404,984" and insert "$10,555,034" "$11,163,630" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$2,291,015" and insert "$2,277,423" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$2,903,362" and insert "$2,885,057" "$3,077,245" (4) Long Term Services and Supports Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$93,667,385" and insert "$90,886,944" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$127,243,759" and insert "$123,498,875" "$130,854,219" (5) Rehabilitation Services Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$13,343,669" and insert "$13,508,241" Section 9. Adjust all totals accordingly in sections 1 to 8, inclusive, of this Act. Section 10. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2020 may be carried over to fiscal year 2021. Section 11. This Act is effective June 29, 2020.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referral to committee waived pursuant to JR 6D-1
